content.text: Match ends, Juventus 0, Barcelona 0.
Second Half ends, Juventus 0, Barcelona 0.
Attempt missed. Medhi Benatia (Juventus) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Paulo Dybala with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Juventus. Conceded by Marc-André ter Stegen.
Attempt saved. Paulo Dybala (Juventus) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Alex Sandro.
Gerard Piqué (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
